bibl.title: The Bryn Mawr Papyri (Part I).
bibl.note: Édition de deux des huit papyrus conservés au Bryn Mawr College (les six inédits paraîtront ultérierement dans BASP). - 1. Inv. 6. Homer, Iliad, 1. 40-44. Provenance unknown, first century. - 2. Inv. 8. Prose Text (Selective Summary or Exercise with Quotations) Based on Iliad 1. Provenance unknown, first century.
Renner Timothy T., The Bryn Mawr Papyri (Part I).
